caption:
This photograph features a quirky and creative scene set in a parking lot under a clear blue sky dotted with fluffy, white clouds. The main focus of the image is a small toy horse placed on the hood of a silver car. The toy offers an interesting and playful contrast against the sleek, smooth surface of the car.

The cars surrounding the one with the toy horse include a red station wagon to the right and a glimpse of another red vehicle on the left, suggesting a variety of cars typically found in a public parking area. The presence of a tall street lamp in the background along with visible signs and further infrastructure suggest an urban or suburban setting.

Overall, the composition balances elements of everyday life—the cars and parking lot—with a touch of whimsy provided by the toy horse. The photograph captures a mundane setting transformed by a small, imaginative detail, creating a striking visual narrative.
title: Horse on a hood--outside Shea Stadium in Flushing Meadow Park, Queens
